_sText:
Surf_forbidden_tomb2

I have did this map because i really love the theme of this map and i wanted surf more levels in this theme.

I must give credits to riddler and spliff, because they are the original creator of forbidden_tomb1, and they gave me the opportunity of make this awsome map.

Thx to all testers, but specially to Sangre Nueva, because he allways helps me with all, thx again ^^.

I have compiled the map with a custom compiler, that is the reason the map have 16Mb...i recomend this compiler: Vbct_10L_beta
----------------------------------------------------------
Map system:

-1 Spawn
-8 Levels
-1 Jail

-6 Mins to beat it
----------------------------------------------------------

Thats all, hope you like it. Sorry for my english.

PD: the map includes the teleport deagle as in tomb1 :D


***************************************************************************
EDIT: I HAVE FOUND A PROBLEM IN THAT VERSION, BUT I FIXED IT, BUT I DONT WANT A V2 BECAUSE LOOKS VERY BAD. JUST REDOWNLOAD THIS NEW VERSION, AND OVERWRITE THE OTHER ONE...THX
***************************************************************************
